title: The examination of Edw. Fitzharris, relating to the Popish plot taken the tenth day of March, 1680/1 published in print by order of the House of Commons the twenty fifth of March, 1681.
author: Fitzharris, Edward, 1648?-1681.
notes: A deposition of Fitzharris, signed: Rob. Clayton, Geo. Treby.
Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
